Enjoy your own slice of mid-century modernism in Old Town Scottsdale. Penthouse 7703 offers sweeping Camelback views from the 7th floor with 11 ft. floor to ceiling windows spanning the entire residence. This double master offers luxurious design elements, resort amenities, and one-of-a- kind life style. Enjoy Arizona sunsets from the oversized balcony. Having cut her teeth on large group dynamics, Mary has led a professional life of learning to formulate policies to apply to groups as a whole while finding unique and tailored ways to implement them with specific individuals.  This talent, among so many others, has become a powerful tool for Mary to evaluate the needs of clients and construct solutions that address them both creatively and beyond normal expectations.  Give her a task or objective, and she applies her whole self to it without flagging.
